programme.title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Drama, Animation, Family, Fantasy ║ 2022 ║ PG
programme.desc: Brooklyn plumbers Mario and Luigi are fixing a leak to a water main when they are transported down a mysterious pipe into a magical land. The brothers are subsequently separated and Mario embarks on a quest to track down Luigi, assisted by Princess Peach, ruler of Mushroom Kingdom. programme.title: Shrek
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Romance, Children's ║ 2001 ║ U
programme.desc: Animated fantasy comedy featuring the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz. programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Romance, Children's ║ 2004 ║ PG
programme.desc: Sequel to the hit animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz. On returning from their honeymoon, Shrek and Princess Fiona are invited to stay with her parents in the kingdom of Far Far Away. But King Harold is less than enchanted by his new son-in-law, and the Fairy Godmother has good reason to want the ogre out of Fiona's life. Cue assassin-for hire Puss-in-Boots.. programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on the bestselling novel by Dan Brown, starring Tom Hanks and Audrey Tautou. When the victim of a ritualised killing is discovered at the Louvre, French cryptographer Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon are called in to try to identify strange symbols cut into the body. programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Dan Brown's forerunner to The Da Vinci Code, starring Tom Hanks and Ayelet Zurer. With the election of a new pope imminent, the Illuminati kidnap the four leading contenders and issue a coded message that they will murder the men and blow up the Vatican. programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Following the death of Superman, intelligence officer Amanda Waller convinces Washington DC officials to let her assemble Task Force X, a team of lethal criminals. Deadshot, Harley Quinn and Killer Croc are among those strong-armed into a deadly mission involving an archaeologist possessed by a demonic witch. programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. Unconventional speech therapist Lionel Logue is enlisted to help the future George VI find his voice - and despite Logue's disregard for all things stately, the two men form an unlikely bond Tom Hooper - Director, Tom Hooper - Director Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret.

programme.title: Far and Away
programme.desc: Romantic period adventure starring Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman. Western Ireland, 1892: seeking to avenge his father's death and the destruction of his home, hot-headed young tenant farmer Joseph Donelly tries to kill landlord Daniel Christie. programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story starring Matthew McConaughey, Jennifer Garner and Jared Leto. In the mid-1980s, macho, homophobic rodeo rider Ron Woodroof is stunned to discover that he is HIV-positive. He begins to research the illness, and soon becomes convinced that a new, experimental treatment is the most effective way to prolong his life. programme.title: Armageddon Time
programme.desc: Jewish-American 11-year-old Paul Graff attends Public School 173 in 1980 New York, where dreams of NASA and space rockets are a distraction from the teachings of ill-tempered Mr Turkeltaub. programme.title: Finding You

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: Wartime comedy starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey. programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Period epic starring Russell Crowe and Joaquin Phoenix. programme.title: The Cinema List: The 90s
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity film fans go back to the 90s to celebrate some of the decade's greatest films, from classic comedies to epic blockbusters.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Horror, Thriller, Documentary And Factual, Arts And Culture, Sci Fi ║ 1999 ║ 12
programme.desc: Period horror adventure starring Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz. programme.title: The Cinema List: Revenge
programme.desc: Some films are best served cold, so wrap up and join us as we dive into our favourite revenge movies - from new hits to Oscar-winning classics. We hope you're ready for action.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jackie Chan
programme.desc: From 80s hit Police Story to 2010 blockbuster The Karate Kid, discover some of the most iconic films in Jackie Chan's prolific career. And remember, don't try this at home.

programme.title: Royal Warriors
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police officer forms an alliance with a flight security agent to foil a hijacking. Thriller, starring Michelle Yeoh and Hiroyuki Sanada David Chung - Director, Kan-Cheung Tsang - Writer, John Sham - Producer, Romeo Díaz - Composer, Kwok-Kuen Cheung - Editor, David Chung - Director, Kan-Cheung Tsang - Writer, John Sham - Producer, Romeo Díaz - Composer, Kwok-Kuen Cheung - Editor Michelle Yeoh - Michelle Yip Hiroyuki Sanada - Peter Yamamoto Michael Wong - Michael Wong Ying Bai - Final avenging gangmember Paul Chun - Chubby escort policeman Shiu-Hung Hui - Disco patron on balcony 1 Kenneth Tsang - Captain Lau Chi-Shing Fung Woo - Disco patron on balcony 2 Dennis Chan - Reporter Michelle Yeoh - Michelle Yip Hiroyuki Sanada - Peter Yamamoto Michael Wong - Michael Wong Ying Bai - Final avenging gangmember Paul Chun - Chubby escort policeman Shiu-Hung Hui - Disco patron on balcony 1 Kenneth Tsang - Captain Lau Chi-Shing Fung Woo - Disco patron on balcony 2 Dennis Chan - Reporter.

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with powers of Egyptian gods, a former slave is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world. JM's wife Helene furnishes Liam with a contract and non-disclosure agreement, as well as offering advice on how to navigate JM's prickly nature.
